wikipedia_page.main: Samuel Edward Westley (born 4 February 1994) is an English former footballer who played as a defender.

response: Born in Venlo to Turkish parents, Korkmaz made his professional debut in the Eerste Divisie for VVV-Venlo on 1 April 2016 in a game against FC Den Bosch as a substitute for Sam Westley.
